- connect to ottcvs1
- retrieve the Grant project
- exit eclipse, and the following will be written to .log:

sorry, when you connect to ottcvs1 the location should be /home/cvs/swtwork

This is that problem we fixed yesterday, isn't DJ/John? Please close in that
case. The fix will be in the next integration build.

Unfortuanate side effect of changing the SaveManager#shutdown to be in the
Workspace#close method. (running the snapshot job during shutdown nested in
another operation)

We found this yesterday but not in time to get it into the integration build.

Looking at the code, it looks like there are no ill side effects, just noise to
the user's log file.

Fix has been released to HEAD and will be in the next integration build.
